common.system_description: Your favorite general goods store. Find quality products with the best prices and personalized service. Everything you need, all in one place.
common.call_to_action: Create your account and start shopping now!

messages.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
messages.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

auth.sign_up_subtitle: Fill in the basic information to get started
auth.login_description: Access your StoreHub account and continue enjoying the best deals. Track your orders and get access to exclusive promotions.
auth.login_call_to_action: Sign in now and enjoy our offers!
auth.forgot_password_subtitle: Enter your email to receive recovery instructions
auth.forgot_password_description: Don't worry! Enter your registered email and we'll send you a secure link to reset your password and regain access to your account.
auth.forgot_password_call_to_action: Recover access to your account in just a few clicks!
auth.reset_email_sent_message: We've sent a recovery link to the email address provided. Please check your inbox and spam folder.
auth.email_not_found_message: We couldn't find an account with this email. Please check if you typed it correctly or create a new account.

forms.password_min_length: Password must be at least {{min}} characters long
forms.password_no_non_alphanumeric: Password must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character (e.g., @, #, $, %, &, *)
forms.password_no_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter (a-z)
forms.password_no_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter (A-Z)

indentity.concurrencyFailure: Optimistic concurrency failure, object was modified
indentity.loginAlreadyAssociated: A user with this login already exists
indentity.invalidUserName: Login is invalid, can only contain letters or digits
indentity.passwordTooShort: Passwords must contain at least {length} characters
indentity.passwordRequiresNonAlphanumeric: Passwords must contain at least one non-alphanumeric character
indentity.passwordRequiresDigit: Passwords must contain at least one digit ('0'-'9')
indentity.passwordRequiresLower: Passwords must contain at least one lowercase character ('a'-'z')
indentity.passwordRequiresUpper: Passwords must contain at least one uppercase character ('A'-'Z')

welcome.hero_subtitle: Your general goods store with the best products and prices. Everything you need in one place.

products.title: Our Products
products.no_products: No products available at the moment
